verses.verse: Brothers <WG80>, if <WG1437> <WG99999> a man <WG444> be overtaken <WG4301> in <WG1722> <WG99999> a fault <WG3900>, you <WG5210> which are <WG3588> spiritual <WG4152>, restore <WG2675> such a one <WG5108> in <WG1722> the spirit <WG4151> of meekness <WG4236>; considering <WG4648> yourself <WG4572>, lest <WG3361> you <WG4771> also <WG2532> be tempted <WG3985>.
